message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth might be different to you. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and what you perceive its worth to be. I believe this is an opportunity for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
